Text: Heh...heheheh!
Good earth...good water...good wind...
...good sun...good shade...big house...big lab...
...and everything outside will be a testing ground!

It'll be...an awesome defense system...also usable
for training!
Master said...
"We need a knockout system to defend our home turf."

One where you have to fight one at a time to get
through...

Couldn't build that in the village...but that's what
he really wanted!
Heh...heheh...hee hee hee!
Build...something...awesome!
Those footsteps... Is that Gamma?
Lady Alphaaa! I-It's unbeliev—agh!
Your nose...I'm relieved it isn't bleeding.

Well, what's the matter? Did something happen in
Midgar?
Lady Alpha! Don't tell me you haven't seen it yet!
Seen what?!
That thing outside!

I still haven't stepped out today. Did something
happen? If it requires an urgent counterattack,
we must mobilize the Garden immediately—
It's the training center!

Training center? I have the plans Eta drew up right
here. I planned to check them this morning and give
her detailed instructions later in the evening—

But it's already completed! The training center
wasn't there yesterday, but it's standing there
today!
Already completed?!

...Hold on. It's only been two days since I discussed
it with Eta.
What were you doing yesterday, Lady Alpha?

I spent the day compiling and reviewing the plans for
organizing the members that Lambda had brought up.

Eta must have completed everything during that time!
I was away in Lindwurm as well...

That's incredibly fast, even with the use of slime
for construction. I'll have to take a look at it.
...Oh, Lady Alpha...the facility's done.
*yawn* I'm...sleepy...
What do you think, Lady Alpha?

It looks more like a fortress than a training center
with defense capabilities. I was going to the point
that out on the blueprints, but...

Since we're also using it for training...I designed
it...for practical battle use.

Why is it comprised of several large compartments
connected by a single winding path?

You have to defeat...whoever stands in your path...
one at a time...to reach the end.

This is Shadow's "Shadow Wisdom"... There are seven
of us...so...I've made seven defense compartments.

I see... With this structure, combined with placement
of golems, we can significantly limit the movement
of invading enemy forces.

We can defend a single point while tracking the
enemy's movements, and in peacetime, we can
use the multiple compartments to divide training!

What a clever structure—just the kind Shadow would
have designed!
Um, Lady Alpha?!
What is it, Gamma?

I understand the rationale of the defense system!
It's an indispensable structure based on the
wisdom of Master Shadow!

But aren't all these golems...clearly excessive?
It will require vast amounts of capital to
maintain and operate these numbers.

And as for you...Lambda! Why didn't you do anything
to stop Eta?!
W-Well...

Lambda...is powerless to refuse...aiding my
experiments!
Sir! Yes sir!
Oh jeez...

In other words, Shadow and the Seven Shadows' orders
are absolute for you, correct?
Sir! Yes sir!

These golems are not only defensive weapons for the
ancient city, but also function perfectly as mock
opponents for training!

Also, Lady Eta would like to use you, Lady Gamma, to
evaluate the golems and obtain special combat data!
Special combat data? Why not use Lady Alpha?
You'll use...magic gear.
Magic gear...?

My guess is that Eta already has a picture of the
completed product in her head, and she needs
to confirm it through experimentation.

Eta's experiments... I've got a terrible feeling
about this!
